nodes.text: Tam Bastion was a human male leader within the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the Galactic Civil War. He and several other Rebel operatives, including Kitomag, became stranded on Burnin Konn when Imperial Governor Ubrik Adelhard locked down the entire Anoat sector as part of the Iron Blockade.
Tam Bastion is a character who appears mobile game Star Wars: Uprising, released on September 10, 2015.
